examples.korean: his much put-upon wife 발음듣기 많이 혹사당하는 그의 아내 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She overworks her staff. 발음듣기 그녀는 직원들을 혹사한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
to strain a muscle 발음듣기 근육을 혹사하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
